alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Isle of Wight, and southeastern York Counties, the City of Hampton and the City of Newport News through 445 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smithfield, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Smithfield around 400 PM EDT. Rescue around 415 PM EDT. Fort Eustis around 420 PM EDT. Christopher Newport University and Denbigh around 430 PM EDT. Patrick Henry Field and Beaconsdale around 440 PM EDT. Hampton, Northampton and Tabb around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Rushmere, Carrollton, Longview, Benns Church, Oriana, Bethel Church, Hilton Village, Lawson, Comet and Moonlight. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; York
